title: "In Game" But I only just logged in?
body: So I log in and I go to join queue but it says I'm already assigned to a game. I restart client only to have the "reconnect" button show up. I'm not quite sure what is going on, but it would be great to have it sorted out.

replies.body: It seems you've encountered a ghost game. They happen when the client doesn't get the message that the game is over properly. They sort themselves out in a couple hours usually, sometimes it can be a little longer.
